snippet: At Pitti Uomo, the designer Shayne Oliver fails to impress, but “Cloakroom” — a presentation by Olivier Saillard and featuring Tilda Swinton — was as compelling as it was strange.
abstract: Guy Trebay looks at highlights from Milan Fashion Week; notes that designer Shayne Oliver's Hood By Air show near Florence, Italy, comes off as disappointment to some, while fashion historian Olivier Saillard's Cloakroom show is both compelling and strange.
lead_paragraph: At Pitti Uomo, the designer Shayne Oliver fails to impress, but “Cloakroom” — a presentation by Olivier Saillard and featuring Tilda Swinton — was as compelling as it was strange.

headline.main: Hood by Air Builds the Suspense, and Tilda Swinton Erotically Checks Coats
